Constructs a sentinel.

@1@ Default constructor. [[cpp/language/value_initialization|Value-initializes]] the underlying sentinel.
@2@ Initializes the underlying sentinel {{tti|end_}} with {{c|1=ranges::end(parent.base_)}}.
@3@ Conversion from {{c|/*sentinel*/&lt;false&gt;}} to {{c|/*sentinel*/&lt;true&gt;}}. Move constructs the underlying sentinel {{tti|end_}} with {{c|1=std::move(i.end_)}}.
